verse.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ الصِّيَامُ كَمَا كُتِبَ عَلَى الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ
verse.translation: O die ihr glaubt! Das Fasten ist euch vorgeschrieben, so wie es denen vor euch vorgeschrieben war, auf daß ihr gottesfürchtig werden möget.

hadith.text: The best of you are those who learn the Quran and teach it.

historicalEvent.title: The Beginning of Revelation
historicalEvent.description: The first verses of the Quran were revealed to Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) in the Cave of Hira during Ramadan.

figure.name: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)
figure.description: The final messenger of Allah, to whom the Quran was revealed.

verse.arabic: شَهْرُ رَمَضَانَ الَّذِي أُنزِلَ فِيهِ الْقُرْآنُ هُدًى لِّلنَّاسِ وَبَيِّنَاتٍ مِّنَ الْهُدَىٰ وَالْفُرْقَانِ
verse.translation: Der Monat Ramadan (ist es), in dem der Koran als Rechtleitung für die Menschen herabgesandt worden ist...

hadith.text: Whoever fasts Ramadan out of faith and in the hope of reward, his previous sins will be forgiven.

historicalEvent.title: The Battle of Badr
historicalEvent.description: Occurred on the 17th of Ramadan, 2 AH. A pivotal victory for the early Muslim community.

figure.name: Imam Al-Ghazali
figure.description: One of the most influential thinkers of the Islamic Golden Age. Known as 'Hujjat al-Islam'.
